channel.title: Learn on Rattling
channel.description: Recent content in Learn on Rattling

item.title: Examples
item.description:
Here are several entries from an ever-growing list of examples:

  • Random energy model. A model of a random Boltzmann distribution on configurations of $+/-$ spins. The configurations have energies that are independent normal random variables.
  • Random chemical reaction system. A model of a chemical reaction system in which a fixed number of species react with random rate constants. The maximum molecularity of the reactions is also fixed.
